name: Debian Desktop (password 'dockside')
description: Debian Desktop environment served to browser using integrated VNC client and server. See https://github.com/newsnowlabs/dockside-debian-desktop
command: [ -x "$(which sudo)" ] || (apt update && apt -y install sudo); /usr/local/bin/websockify --daemon --web /opt/noVNC-1.3.0/ 0.0.0.0:8080 localhost:5901; vncserver -xstartup /usr/bin/openbox-session -desktop '{container.hostname}' :1; sleep infinity
